text:
Always Wear Sunscreen

It’s essential to wear sunscreen every day, even if it looks cloudy outside. “I normally start with my skincare products, and then whenever I’m ready to put on my makeup, I apply my sunscreen,” says content creator Marwah Khamas. “Wait a few minutes before applying your makeup to give your skin enough time to soak in the sunscreen. Then, continue with primer and foundation.” The L’Oréal Paris Bright Reveal SPF 50 Daily UV Lotion has an invisible texture that blends well into all skin tones and acts as a primer for makeup.
